content.prompt: Martini’s argument in the second paragraph most clearly refers to the late-nineteenth-century belief that imperialism was a useful way to

choices.label: relieve overcrowding and land shortages in European countries
secure raw materials for European factories
“civilize” native populations through social change

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
